title: DeepSeek Chat Exporter
description: Made this browser extension because of me schizoing with DeepSeek almost every time so I fell in love with it. I might just make my own PDF (or JSON) exporter for chat.deepseek.com.

title: File2
description: A simple file hosting service with S3 storage backend. Made as a side-project for those who love catbox and pomf.se clones.

title: Tav-AI
description: Next generation API service based on Rimunace API v3.0.0. Collaboration with zhipeng_lin using Elysia.js + Bun stack.

title: BeBoxed
description: 2nd version with Appwrite Authentication. Storage using Storage Block attached to the server. Not the best, but honest work.

title: BeReader
description: Seamless and distraction-free reading environment with auth system, settings, and followers/following. Inspired by X/Twitter and GitHub.

title: BePasted
description: Pastebin clone with functionality and simplicity in mind. Text and code snippet sharing service inspired by Pastefy.

title: Apis.Rocks
description: API Service for personal use and open-sourced. Now using NodeJS with Elysia framework instead of Golang.

title: Rimunace API
description: API Service under Respy.Tech offering various utilities, QoL endpoints, and AI endpoints with Claude, GPT, Gemini, DeepSeek R1, and Llama 3.1.

title: Respy.Tech
description: First ever website that started it all. A minimalist dark-themed website showcasing API services with modern 3D elements.
